title: Media Engine
content:
It seems as it the tail on the “e” was manipulated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830074138im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/mediaengine.gif)

 [‹ (x) Robben Island, Cape Town, South Africa - Basque {Mark C}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830074138/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18598 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Be seen as the Market Leader" serif face - Georgia {Dav} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830074138/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18593 "Go to next forum topic")
author: signs79

comments.content:
The “a” looks a bit odd to me.

I don’t really understand it, but there’s some information [here.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830074138/http:/www.grapefruit.ro/clients/media_engine/naming/en/)

Richard

So they probably used it’s alias (Humanist 970) and thinned and thickened the strokes and adjusted the a.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/humanist-970/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830074138/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/humanist-970/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/humanist-970/")
